CustomField.description: Returns true if the practitioner that carried out the current appointment is an affiliate (defined by the practitioner being a portal user)
CustomField.formula: IF( OR(Practitioner__r.Profile.Name = 'WaW Customer Community Plus Login', Practitioner__r.Profile.Name = 'WaW Customer Community Plus User', Practitioner__r.Profile.Name = 'WAW Partner Community Login User', Practitioner__r.Profile.Name = 'WAW Partner Community User', Practitioner__r.Profile.Name = 'Affiliate Community Plus Login User', Practitioner__r.Profile.Name = 'Affiliate Community Plus User'), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Practitioner Is Affiliate?
